last_episode_to_air.name: Ten Minutes in the Present and One Minute in the Past
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lina returns to her hometown to see her widowed father before leaving for India. Once back in Madrid, she's faced with a possible change of plans.

name: The Time It Takes
overview: Lina and Nico break up after many years together, and Lina struggles to find a new life and to think about him a little less each day.

episodes.name: One Minute in the Present and Ten Minutes in the Past
episodes.overview: Nine years into their relationship, Nico and Lina are breaking up — which sends Lina back to the first night they met and how very easy it seemed.

episodes.name: Two Minutes in the Present and Nine Minutes in the Past
episodes.overview: A friend comes to help Lina pack and lets her know Nico's moving on with new projects. That makes her remember when their life was tied to her ambition.

episodes.name: Three Minutes in the Present and Eight Minutes in the Past
episodes.overview: Lina tries to move on but nothing feels quite right and everything takes her back down memory lane.

episodes.name: Four Minutes in the Present and Seven Minutes in the Past
episodes.overview: Lina can't help but think back to moments of revelation, like after Nico's accident, when it became clear he hadn't told her the truth.

episodes.name: Five Minutes in the Present and Six Minutes in the Past
episodes.overview: An apartment-hunting trek and a postcard that arrives much too late put the spotlight on what Lina had wanted with Nico.

episodes.name: Six Minutes in the Present and Five Minutes in the Past
episodes.overview: Lina and Nico had a pact about her birthday. Now separated and partying with friends, she longs for their pact to be kept.

episodes.name: Seven Minutes in the Present and Four Minutes in the Past
episodes.overview: Lina gets the chicken pox, which only further isolates her. She remembers the trip back from Nico's father's funeral and his profound sadness.

episodes.name: Eight Minutes in the Present and Three Minutes in the Past
episodes.overview: Lina lands a fellowship but has a hard time being happy without someone to share it with. She recalls a costume party, and Nico dressed as an old man.

episodes.name: Nine Minutes in the Present and Two Minutes in the Past
episodes.overview: A trip to Morocco proves renewing for Lina, who follows her heart and her instincts when she feels drawn to a jewelry maker.

episodes.name: Ten Minutes in the Present and One Minute in the Past
episodes.overview: Lina returns to her hometown to see her widowed father before leaving for India. Once back in Madrid, she's faced with a possible change of plans.
